Navigate to 'https://example.com/dashboard'
Verify the 'Welcome User' text element has font size 24px, color #1a1a1a, font family 'Inter', left margin 20px, and top margin 15px
Verify the 'Settings' button is visible, has border radius 4px, and its background color is rgb(0,123,255) when enabled

On 'https://example.com/item/P001', verify the primary product image has source 'product_P001_main.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x400px, alt text 'Stylish leather backpack', loads within 500ms, and does not have any watermark
Click 'Add to Cart'
Verify the shopping cart icon displays a count of 1, background color changes to #28a745, text color is #ffffff, animates with a 'pulse' effect lasting 300ms, and its width is 32px and height is 32px
Verify the 'Search' input field placeholder text is 'Enter keywords...', border is 1px solid #ced4da, and font size is 16px
Verify the 'Search' input field border color becomes #80bdff and a transition of 200ms applies to the border color when focused
Access 'https://example.com/video/intro'
Verify the video is initially muted, player width is 1280px, and height is 720px
Verify the 'Play' button has aria-label 'Play video' and opacity is 1
Verify the 'Edit Profile' button is enabled, has padding 10px on all sides, font weight 600, text color #007bff, top position 200px, and left position 50px
Load 'https://example.com/contact'
Verify the 'Submit' button has background color #007bff, color #ffffff, border radius 5px, and width 150px
Verify the 'Submit' button hover background color transitions to #0056b3 over 150ms
Set viewport width to 768px
Verify the 'About Us' link is visible, has font size 14px, text aligned center within its container, x coordinate 100, and y coordinate 30
Load 'https://example.com/long-article'
Scroll down the page by 500px
Verify the 'Back to Top' button appears, bottom position 30px, right position 30px, and its icon's shape is circular with diameter 40px and background color #6c757d
Verify the 'Terms and Conditions' checkbox is not selected by default, its label text is 'I agree to the Terms and Conditions', and its width is 18px and height is 18px
Verify the 'Terms and Conditions' checkbox border changes to 2px solid #007bff upon selection
Verify the 'Product Price' display for 'P001' has text content '$29.99', font size 22px, color #dc3545, font weight 700, and margin-bottom 10px
Verify the 'Date Picker' component current selected date is '2023-10-27'
Verify the 'Date Picker' input field placeholder is 'Select a date'
Verify the 'Date Picker' calendar icon has aria-label 'Open calendar' and right padding 8px
Verify the 'Download Report' link has source 'https://example.com/reports/latest.pdf', text color #007bff, underline decoration, and alt text contains 'Annual Report 2023'
Click 'Expand Details'
Verify the additional product details section becomes visible, height is 200px, background color #f8f9fa, padding 15px, and its opacity changes from 0 to 1 over 300ms
Verify the 'Password' input field has border 1px solid #ced4da, font family 'Arial', and width 300px
Verify the 'Password' input field border color is #007bff and it is focused when active
Verify the 'Notification' badge displays a count of 3, background color #ffc107, color #212529, border radius 50%, and font size 12px
Verify the 'Language Selector' dropdown displays 'English' as the current value, its button has width 120px and height 38px, text alignment is left, and border is 1px solid #6c757d
Load 'https://example.com/gallery'
Verify the first gallery image has natural dimensions 1920x1080px, source 'image_001.jpg', is fully loaded within 1 second, and its alt text is 'Scenic landscape view'
Verify the 'User Avatar' element has rendered dimensions 50x50px, shape is circular, source 'user_avatar_default.png', border 2px solid #ffffff, and margin-right 10px
Verify the 'Account Balance' display text content is '$1,234.56', font size 20px, font weight 500, color #28a745, x coordinate 150, and y coordinate 80
